trans-unit.source: Provides a way to apply a sort expression to an <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> data source object after an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression"></xref> expression is applied.
trans-unit.target: Gjør det mulig å bruke et sorteringsuttrykk til en <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>datakildeobjektet etter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression"> </xref> brukes uttrykket.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: After a sort operation is performed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> expression in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control, subsequent sort operations can be performed by using the ThenBy class on a different data field.
trans-unit.target: Etter en sortering operasjonen utføres ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>uttrykk i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>kontrollere etterfølgende sortering operasjoner kan utføres ved hjelp av klassen ThenBy på et annet datafelt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object to apply the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"></xref> expression to.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egenskapen for den <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>objekt for å bruke den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"> </xref> uttrykk som.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> sorts the data on a specified data field.

Subsequent sort operations can be performed on a different data field by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.ThenByExpressions%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Etterfølgende sorteringsoperasjoner kan utføres på et annet datafelt ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.ThenByExpressions%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.ThenByExpressions%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the data field to apply the `ThenBy` sort operation to.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir datafeltet du vil bruke den `ThenBy` sortere operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The property of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> object to apply the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"></xref> expression to.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen for den <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>objekt for å bruke den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.ThenBy"> </xref> uttrykk som.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ordering direction of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> data source object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir bestilling retningen på den <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>datakildeobjektet.</xref:System.Linq.IQueryable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression> is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> control to sort data in ascending or descending order.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>brukes i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender>kontrollen for å sortere dataene i stigende eller synkende rekkefølge.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryExtender> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression>

trans-unit.source: The direction of the sort operation is specified by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.Direction%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Sorteringsoperasjonen Sorteringsretningen angis ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.Direction%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Expressions.OrderByExpression.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ordering direction of the <xref:System.Linq.IQueryable> data source object.
